item.title: Inverse Reinforcement Learning
item.description: Introduction In this post, I will review most cited approaches in the field of inverse reinforcement learning (and imitation learning) that are pertain to my dissertation. We have two main interests: To explain agent’s behavior through describing its reward structure and explore the relationship between the informed trading intensities and the reward function (e.g., when informed trading is more likely to occur, the magnitude of price change might be less important than the order imbalance).
